Class JavascriptHTMLBundleLinkRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.renderer.AbstractBundleLinkRenderer
      • net.jawr.web.resource.bundle.renderer.JavascriptHTMLBundleLinkRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, BundleRenderer, JsBundleLinkRenderer

    public class JavascriptHTMLBundleLinkRenderer
extends AbstractBundleLinkRenderer
implements JsBundleLinkRenderer
    Renderer that creates javascript link tags.

    Jordi Hernández Sellés, Ibrahim Chaehoi
